<rule id="security-manager-deprecation-00010" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="{fqcn}"/>  
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="5" title="The {fqcn} class has been deprecated">
                    <message>
                        References to Java Security Manager API classes deprecated in Java 17. Any references to it should be removed. 
                        See the link for further information.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://openjdk.org/jeps/411" title="JEP 411: Deprecate the Security Manager for Removal"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="fqcn">
                <matches pattern="(java.lang.SecurityManager|java.rmi.RMISecurityManager|javax.security.auth.SubjectDomainCombiner)"/>
             </where>
        </rule>
